content_descriptors.notes: The player, agents, and enemies bleed when attacked and damage is dealt to them. Additionally, the first mission contains a decapitated agent. Drug and alcohol use is referenced through the fictitious legal and illicit drugs found in the game.

name: RAIDING PARTY Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Home 64-bit (6.1, Build 7601)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770K Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 Ti
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio - RTKVHD64.sys
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit (10.0 Build 19045)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-10900K Processor
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Digital Output (Realtek(R) Audio) - RTKVHD64.sys
